title: Savage Wrongs
description: Exerpt from back She wants only his love-Forced by her brutish father to dress as a boy and go on Indian raids, lovely Mariah Temple wants only to live a normal life. But first, the flame-haired beauty must make amends to the peaceful Chippewas she unwillingly helped persecute. The tribe, amazed by her great courage, adopts her and allows her to care for their injured chief.
author: Cassie Edwards
